abstract: A response that contains a single alternative distribution package resource.
overview:
## Discussion

This object is the response that contains a single the alternative distribution package. For more information, see Creating and reading distribution packages. The schema of the response body is below.
platforms: Unsupported OS: App Store Connect API

items.description: The data structure that represents an alternative distribution package resource.
items.name: AlternativeDistributionPackage

items.description: The request body you use to create an alternative distribution package.

items.description: A response that contains a list of alternative distribution package version resources.

items.description: The data structure that represents an alternative distribution package delta resource.

items.description: A response that contains a single alternative distribution package delta resource.
items.name: AlternativeDistributionPackageDeltaResponse

items.description: A response that contains a list of alternative distribution package delta resources.

items.description: The data structure that represents an alternative distribution package variant resource.

items.description: A response that contains a list of alternative distribution package variant resources.

title: AlternativeDistributionPackageResponse
